name: Star Chaser (Devora Studios)
description:
Star Chaser is a Prototype I started working on at Train Jam 2018, it started out as an idea of a Platformer where the most important aspect of a Platformer - the predictability of a jump - is taken out of the situation.

The game ended up being a 2D Physics Platformer where you play as a Falling Star, and you must use other stars Gravitational Pull to move around the stage.
